text:
Transforming Coordinates

In the Stretching and Shrinking unit, we learned that computer programs that creates video displays for television shows and video games use coordinate graphing systems. We used the coordinate grid to create Wumps for a video game. The axes and grid lines are hidden from view but are essential to setting the pixels that you see.

In this Investigation, we will continue to develop our understanding and skill of coordinate rules for transformations and use that knowledge to solve geometry problems.

As we explore transformations on a grid, check to see how the properties of the transformations we used in Investigations 1 and 2 hold for the transformations on a grid.

What are the properties of the transformations we studied thus far?
